title: American horror story coven - zoe returns Spalding his tongue and then kills him
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: I really love the devotion Spalding always had to Fiona, how he wickedly loved her since she was young and how, no matter what, he kept respecting and maybe still loving her so he'd do anything for her, what a nice butler
Zoe at first was  not a good witch then become bad ass i really like her, and she never miss treat cordelia like queenie (which gladly dies in hotel)
Why wasn’t he in Season 2 Asylum? He’s been in every other season & is Phenomenal!!!💜👻💜
Why did she kill him, she could have made him tell the truth and gotten Fiona burnt at the stake

I’m going to take a page from Bill Maher’s book, new rule, if you’re going to kill someone on American horror story and they’re a bad guy, never in the house. They always come back. It’s AHS 101, ironic when you consider this a school for witches.
description:
American horror story coven - zoe enchanted Spalding tongue and then returns it back to Spalding only to find out who killed Madison 
3x6 the axeman cometh
